com.mozilla.secops.httprequest

Class HTTPRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mozilla.secops.httprequest.HTTPRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class HTTPRequest
extends Object
implements Serializable
    HTTPRequest describes and implements a Beam pipeline for analysis of HTTP requests using log data.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HTTPRequest.EndpointAbuseAnalysis
      Transform for detection of a single source making excessive requests of a specific endpoint path solely.
      static class  HTTPRequest.EndpointSequenceAbuse
      Transform for detection of a single source making a sequence of requests at a speed faster than what we expect from a normal user.
      static class  HTTPRequest.ErrorRateAnalysis
      Transform for analysis of error rates per client within a given window.
      static class  HTTPRequest.HardLimitAnalysis
      Transform for analysis of hard per-source request count limit within fixed window
      static class  HTTPRequest.Has4xxRequestStatus
      Function to be used with filter transform in order to include only client errors
      static interface  HTTPRequest.HTTPRequestOptions
      Runtime options for HTTPRequest pipeline.
      static class  HTTPRequest.KeyAndWindowForSessionsFireEarly
      Key requests for session analysis and window into sessions
      static class  HTTPRequest.PerEndpointErrorRateAnalysis
      Transform for detection of a single source generating errors at a given path pattern.
      static class  HTTPRequest.ThresholdAnalysis
      Composite transform that conducts threshold analysis using the configured threshold modifier
      static class  HTTPRequest.UserAgentBlocklistAnalysis
      Analysis to identify known bad user agents
      static class  HTTPRequest.WindowForFixed
      Window events into fixed one minute windows

        public static void addToggleCacheEntry(String name,
                                       HTTPRequestToggles entry)

        Parameters:

        entry - Cache entry

      • getInput

        public static Input getInput(org.apache.beam.sdk.Pipeline p,
                             HTTPRequest.HTTPRequestOptions options)
                      throws IOException
        Given HTTPRequest pipeline options, return a configured Input class

        The returned input object will be configured based on the HTTPRequest pipeline options, and will have all applicable filters assigned.

        Parameters:
        p - Pipeline
        options - Pipeline options
        Returns:
        Configured Input object
        Throws:
        IOException - IOException

      • readInput

        public static HashMap<String,org.apache.beam.sdk.values.PCollection<Event>> readInput(org.apache.beam.sdk.Pipeline p,
                                                                                      Input input,
                                                                                      HTTPRequest.HTTPRequestOptions options)
        Read from a configured Input object, returning a map of events

        The map that is returned will have a string key that reflects the element name (which should correspond to the monitored resource), and the value will be a collection of events for that element.

        Parameters:
        p - Pipeline
        input - Configured Input object
        options - Pipeline options
        Returns:
        Map of element name/event collection

      • expandInputMap

        public static org.apache.beam.sdk.values.PCollection<Alert> expandInputMap(org.apache.beam.sdk.Pipeline p,

                                                                           HTTPRequest.HTTPRequestOptions options)
        Expand the input map, executing analysis transforms for each element
        Parameters:
        p - Pipeline
        inputMap - Map of service name to input collection
        options - Pipeline options
        Returns:
        Flattened alerts in the global window
